row.name: JOBS.WIN.NEW.3
row.description: AgVantis template for JOBS.WIN (documentation and generate at runtime)

row.Docu:
---------0---------0---------0---------0---------0---------0---------0---------0
NAME: ---- 0000 - <job name>
ABSTRACT: -------- <descriptive abstract of what this job does>
ESCALATION: ---------- <technical escalation. who to contact for failure>
<business escalation. who to contact if the business is disrupted>
RE-RUN: ------ <can this job be reran? or notes on what to do to before job is reran>
MAINTENANCE: ----------- 1/1/2019 - <who> - Original Write

row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL
$LastFileName = "&LAST_FILE_NAME#"
# # Incoming File Path $InPath = "V:\Processing\AgVantis_In\ReceivedACH"
# # Set script enviroment location Set-Location $InPath
# # Loop through the incoming files get-childitem AC19T431-ACHAJ01101104562PIN* | ForEach-Object {
# Get the date stamp in the file header (25th character) $FileName = $_.Name; $FirstLine = Get-Content $FileName | Select-Object -First 1 $FileDate = $FirstLine.Substring(25, 4)
Write-Host "Original File Name: $FileName" Write-Host "Header: $FirstLine" Write-Host "Last file Name: $LastFileName"
# List out possible file names $FileNameA = 'AH' + $FileDate + 'A' + 'I.001' $FileNameB = 'AH' + $FileDate + 'B' + 'I.001' $FileNameC = 'AH' + $FileDate + 'C' + 'I.001' $FileNameD = 'AH' + $FileDate + 'D' + 'I.001' $FileNameE = 'AH' + $FileDate + 'E' + 'I.001'
Switch ($LastFileName) { $FileNameA {$NewLetter = 'B'} $FileNameB {$NewLetter = 'C'} $FileNameC {$NewLetter = 'D'} $FileNameD {$NewLetter = 'E'} $FileNameE {$NewLetter = 'F'} default {$NewLetter = 'A'} }
# # Set the new file name $NewFileName = 'AH' + $FileDate + $NewLetter + 'I.001' Write-Host "New File Name: $NewFileName"
# #Rename file Move-Item $FileName $NewFileName
}
!Add the file name to the last letter file
:Register_Variable "ANFNAME#", "$NewFileName" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL
